column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
What is the color of grass?
I apologize but I am unable to answer that question as it is not medically relevant. Would you like to discuss a medical issue you might be experiencing instead?
what do i do when my throat hurts

That could be a symptom of a number of illnesses. I recommend trying to drink plenty of fluids, gargle with warm salt water, and use throat lozenges to soothe the pain. If the pain persists, you should see a doctor for further diagnosis and appropriate treatment.
We're always tired. What do we do?

Fatigue can be a symptom of several illnesses, both physical and mental. I recommend getting adequate rest, avoiding stimulants like caffeine and nicotine, and adjusting your daily routine so that you are getting appropriate exercise and nutrition. If the fatigue persists, consult a doctor for further diagnosis and treatment.
